title: Victor Arowolo
text: I am a highly-driven individual with a strong work ethic and a commitment to personal development, holding a Bachelor’s degree in Statistics. My professional journey has encompassed roles in asset management, academia, and research, where I’ve forged sustainable relationships with colleagues and clients alike. With a background rooted in statistical analysis, I bring a keen understanding of data-driven methodologies to my work.  My interests span across machine learning, software development, and a sincere desire to add tangible value to the broader community.
